title: Peter Falconio's girlfriend Joanne Lees speaks of murder
text: 'It was either run, or be raped and killed': Joanne Lees on her terrifying escape from Peter Falconio's killer in the Outback - as she vows to find her boyfriend's body 15 years after he vanished Joanne Lees and Peter Falconio were travelling in a Kombi in outback Australia They were flagged down by Bradley Murdoch who shot dead Mr Falconio Murdoch then handcuffed Ms Lees before dragging her into his vehicle He was later convicted of Mr Falconio's murder but the body was never found Ms Lees has returned to Australian outback and has vowed to find his remains Published: 02:43 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 08:06 GMT, 10 February 2017 49 shares
